query.sql: INSERT INTO stock_lift( stock_code,jj_date,jjsl,jjsz,jjgds,wjjsl,source_type,jjlx,scale,create_time ) VALUES( [ stock_code ] , [ jj_date ] , [ jjsl ] , [ jjsz ] , [ jjgds ] , [ wjjsl ] , [ source_type ] , [ jjlx ] , [ scale ] , now() )
select code from stock s where not exists (select 1 from stock_lift t where t.stock_code=s.code) and s.code!='1A0001' and s.code!='399001' and s.code!='399006' order by rand() limit [count]
